MIXMACHINE_GUIDE_201: In order to fuse monsters together, you'll need two or more monsters, and they all must be at least Level 10. ā The child will be born with some of its parents' skills. ā And it's possible it will get half of the skill points from each parent. ā And this is how synthesized monsters can get stronger than their parents, …… ā But the downside is that the parents will vanish too. ā You should tihnk about your party's balance before you fuse. ā
MIXMACHINE_GUIDE_211: Sometimes, during fusion, the child will earn a positive value in its species. ā Monsters with a high enough "plus rank" will get various benefits. ā Their maximum level will increase, and new traits unlocked, …… ā And their monster rank will increase by some number. ā The monster will take the total "plus rank" of the fused parents. ā Also "plus rank" will increase significantly at level 31 and 76. ā You should think about their levels when you choose monsters to fuse. ā
GB_MSG_SCOUTQ_03_NOTCLEAR: ́Sorry, but that's not right. Come back once you've completed your task. ā ́I want you to have 4 Slimes in your Active party. ā I don't care which Type of slime, just have four slimes! ā
MIXMACHINE_GUIDE_221: Main means to Scout monsters is to use the Scout Attack. ā Using meat items have the effect of increasing the Scout success rate. ā But there are other effective methods. ā Success rate will increase as a monster's attacks get stronger. ā And so you should use Sapperine and Oomph beforehand, …… ā and build up tension before doing a Scout Attack to increase its success. ā
MSG_SHINJU_NO_INN_000: ́Attacks from the Demon World stopped while we were Nochora. ā But they've started up again almost immediately. We must hurry up and revive the Incarnus King!
MIXMACHINE_GUIDE_231: Fellow monsters will obey a Scout's orders during battle, but... ā Monsters with tactics can fight effectively on their own. ā To change Tactics, if press Up on the D-Pad, the cursor will be on the upper screen…… ā you can change tactics for all allies at once. It's really useful, remember it! ā
MSG_MEDALQ_002: ̅Hmm... I guess I haven't received Mini Medal from you yet. ā If you ever find medals out there, could you bring them to me? You will be rewarded accordingly, depending on the number of medals collected... ā I'm counting on you, ȁ.
MIXMACHINE_GUIDE_241: Synthesis and Super Synthesis are available when "plus rank" is 100. ā Monsters born via Super Synthesis are SS Rank, and have greater potential. ā And they can get an additional trait too. ā Also you can swap traits with the parent's traits. ā You can drastically alter strength and their nature by combining various traits. ā Think about what sort of monster you want and then give them those traits. ā
